name: Cajun Air Fryer Salmon
author: France C
summary: Full of flavor with a hint of sweetness, this moist and delicious salmon is ready in under 10 minutes! You may want to add salt before serving if you are using an unsalted Cajun seasoning. I like to use a Misto® sprayer with my own oil, but feel free to use regular cooking spray. For best results, use center-cut fillets that are about an inch thick.
directions: Preheat the air fryer to 390 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Rinse and dry salmon fillets with a paper towel
Combine Cajun seasoning and brown sugar in a small bowl
Press flesh sides of fillets into the seasoning mixture
Spray the basket of the air fryer with cooking spray and place salmon fillets skin-side down
Mist salmon again lightly with cooking spray
Remove from air fryer and let rest for 2 minutes before serving
